channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: One Chaser is all that stands between actress Catherine Tyldesley, entrepreneur Levi Roots, comedian Chris McCausland, rock legend Rick Wakeman and thousands of pounds for charity. S12 Ep2.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The 1% Club
channel.desc: Lee Mack hosts the ultimate leveller of a quiz show where the questions have nothing to do with remembering facts and where 100 contestants aim to win up to 100,000 pounds.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Spectre
channel.desc: Bond film starring Daniel Craig and Christoph Waltz, 2015. 007 receives a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a clandestine criminal organisation called SPECTRE.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.
